attributes.review: This app is absolutely HORRIBLE my pet squid bought me a Wendy’s chicken nugget packet full of McFlurrys and maggots I ate it all and my diarrhea stomach is itching and bleeding now. My bubble pooped on my hand and forced me to lick the tip of his marker and then my pet dad brought me a hœvër board and my right leg-arm has disintegrated into my left butthole 😢 I am absolutely devistaed that my pet hot dog was microwaved in an apple blender and now is my last toenail. McDonald’s gave me gonerhea and now I’m in the hospital for 3rd degree cancer cigarettes. My pest control center opened this app and say an orange burger-hotdog asking for is to wish it happy burfday I am absolutely terrified at this matter and desided to call the management for chik fil a and now I am sued for eating a buttcheek on a stick 🤬 my third grandparents removed my baked potato from the ceiling and I am developing bronchitis from inhaling chicken wing dust. My family is very saddened to hear that I lost all of my pet organs from my collection and now they have to buy me new pet dinosaurs which is bad because my pet chicken nugget is dead in my stomach and the left eardrum in my foot is slowly melting into my pillow on my right arm in the c section isle of Walgreens that burned to the ground in 3000 BC when squid ward was left to eat marshmallow lamps for the rest of eternity. My brother swallowed a larg piece of the moon and now is stuck in my dryer that used to be a blanket for my dog tarantula. This is horrible and I demand a refund from my mic Donald’s French cat order 😿
